website_summaries.verdict: FIFA 15 is easily the most realistic soccer game out there, even if it at times feels a bit over-the-top.
pros: FIFA 15 is a polished and overall refinement of last year's game
Players feel more natural controlling the ball and the new goalkeeper animations look fantastic
cons: Defense in FIFA 15 has a tendency to feel underpowered and less impactful than we would prefer

customer_reviews.title: And PES 6 was best in whole PES series for me
customer_reviews.text: My first FiFA soccer game was FIFA 97. I was played FIFA series until 2002. After then, I played PES series. And PES 6 was best in whole PES series for me. FIFA 15 is my first FIFA series in PS3 and PS4 era. FIFA and PES is quite different from each other. I was played PES for a long time, so PES is friendly to me. But, FIFA 15 if fun to me. I like their micro control, and new defense system. Maybe I'll play PES15 later, because PES 15 got a great review. Nevertheless, I'll keep play FIFA series. It is difficult, but fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: GOOOAAAALLL!
customer_reviews.text: Even if you're not a soccer fan, this game is still crazy fun. The graphics are great, the controls are smooth and sound is spot on. For soccer fans, you must own this game. For those people who haze zero interest in watching soccer on TV (like me), you'll still find entertainment value in this game. It's fun to play the computer, but playing against live competition is a blast. It also has a career mode that is highly entertaining and easy to navigate. I certainly reccomend this game!
customer_reviews.author: Evildead11

customer_reviews.title: is probably their best yet compared to previous and the '16 and '17
customer_reviews.text: My first FIFA game ever. Had always play Winning Eleven or PES but I gave it a chance this time and I dont regret it. FIFA have changed so much with this game, is probably their best yet compared to previous and the '16 and '17 games
customer_reviews.author: Doig90

customer_reviews.title: They have gotten progressively better to achieving what real football/soccer feels like
customer_reviews.text: Been playing the FIFA franchise for more than 10 years. They have gotten progressively better to achieving what real football/soccer feels like. This game is tremendous. Very different from FIFA 14 and that is saying something. The amount of attention to detail that this game provides year in and year out keeps making me comeback. Just buy the game and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gunner

customer_reviews.title: No update after September 2015 ... So they're forcing us to buy their FIFA16
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed from FIFA 15. They stopped updates this game once they release FIFA 16, so they're literally forcing you to buy their new version in order to enjoy, or this game won't be useless in many aspect. I hate FIFA, what a nasty foundation!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Really great game! I play it all the time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great game! I play it all the time and I am able to create my own team and get those packages, which can sometimes have these amazing players but sometimes not so much!
customer_reviews.author: Vickiee

customer_reviews.title: Another year, another FIFA.
customer_reviews.text: Is it better than FIFA 14? Arguably, but definitely not a revolutionary game. Not that there's anything wrong with this. If you must have the latest and greatest, get it. If you already own FIFA 14 and no longer find the gameplay appealing, should stay away (for now). 1 star reduction for removing Share Play from PS4 version.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Another Great FIFA Game.
customer_reviews.text: As always, another quality addition to the EA FIFA franchise. However if you are looking to play as NYCFC or Orlando City SC, they are in the Rest of the World section, and can only be played in Quick Match (no stadiums for them either). Overall a great game that will not disappoint you!
customer_reviews.author: Ann M. Knaak

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. It's definitely more arcade so I guess EA ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It's definitely more arcade so I guess EA is trying to reach out to a larger audience. You can pretty much pass an entire defense with a fast player. Also, there is a flaw (or maybe it's wanted?): if you shoot the ball accurately enough from far far away, it goes into the box 90% of the time. Yes, graphics are a little better but paradoxically the game is less realistic! Terrible -> Got rid of it!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Awsome game
customer_reviews.text: I love this game, great graphics, great animation... Up until now the only downside is the lack of Ronaldinho in the game (I started watching football because of him) but it's not a deal breaker. Well done ea :P
customer_reviews.author: Yoshio

customer_reviews.title: Great game for any football/soccer fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great game. They could've done a better job with the players' faces and I miss the old skill's arena though. Anyway, the gameplay remains excellent and Ultimate Team keeps being quite addictive. I hope they get the Champions League and Copa Libertadores next year.
customer_reviews.author: Bronco

customer_reviews.title: Good game, but looked like the package was already ...
customer_reviews.text: Good game, but looked like the package was already opened when i recieved it. Looked like they did it to rip off the bar code, still prefer they didn't have done that. It then looked like it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied :)
customer_reviews.text: If all the FIFA games made were to compete for the "Best FIFA Game Cup" the winner would be FIFA 15. It's not arcade like as FIFA 14 World cup and others. It actually takes technique and skill. If you love soccer you will love this game.
customer_reviews.author: GU

customer_reviews.title: The game play is amazing and the graphics are off the charts
customer_reviews.text: The game play is amazing and the graphics are off the charts. I can play as my favorite teams and create my own profile to live out my dream as a pro footballer. A must have for any soccer fan.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: the best fifa yet
customer_reviews.text: the best fifa yet. but my heart is set on buying Pes2015 after playing the demo and realizing fifa has become work and PES2015 is more fun. but fifa is no slouch.
customer_reviews.author: Kapado

customer_reviews.title: Very good game !
customer_reviews.text: FIFA 15 is way better than FIFA 14 for me ! + The control of players is faster and more accurate. + The immersion has also been increased. - Graphics are the same than FIFA 14.. we wanted a new Next-Gen game ! - A.I. and Goalkeepers are "sometimes weird"
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN HERARD

customer_reviews.title: FIFA 15 has not disappointed me yet
customer_reviews.text: FIFA 15 has not disappointed me yet. Although you cannot play friendly online games, the majority i would play in FIFA 14 was Online Seasons. They have fixed the overused and overpowered crossing headers which was a huge relief. The graphics are amazing and the gameplay is smooth. Visca Barca!
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Kuk

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. Graphics are beautiful and te game play is awesome. The faces look real and even the crowd doesn't look like cardboard cut outs. I have owned the last 5 years of FIFA and I would say this one is one of hte best. Gorgeous on the Ps4 so waste your day off and play this all day.

customer_reviews.text: Incredible graphics. My little brother is not the biggest soccer fan but still loves this game. The perfect gift

customer_reviews.title: I like the graphics and the goalkeepers AI
customer_reviews.text: I like the graphics and the goalkeepers AI. I don't like the fact that players are much heavier with less agility. It seems like Fifa is following the path of PES... should be the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: Edilson

customer_reviews.title: love it. great graphic and gaming
customer_reviews.text: love it. great graphic and gaming. Cant wait for the next. Better then PES this time. (from someone that grow up with PES and hated FIFA)

customer_reviews.title: What they asked for so I'm happy. I hate shopping and being able to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids x-mas gift. What they asked for so I'm happy. I hate shopping and being able to sit at my computer and accomplish 90% of the x-mas shopping was the way to go for me.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, missing something
customer_reviews.text: This game looks great, but I really wish I could just play a season in the Premier League or MLS with my son. Where is the option to just do that? I don't want to create a guy and do a career, I just want my son to have fun and enjoy soccer. COYS

customer_reviews.text: I don't know why the game does not have the brazilian soccer teams. It is a very nice game but I miss a lot the brazilian teams, specially Botafogo from Rio de Janeiro. With the teams from Brazil it would be a 5 star...

customer_reviews.title: Great game. Im addicted to ultimate team
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Im addicted to ultimate team. It really bugs me that EA is such a money hungry company that doenst care about its customers though.

customer_reviews.text: Sport games aren't worth buying. They get boring fast and this one is not the exception.

customer_reviews.title: Best PS4 game ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of soccer and FIFA since ... always ! And this one is still great ! Of course the game play is not completely different, and the graphics are only slightly better than FIFA 14. But the small improvements make the best game even better ! The players now have a lot more "inertia" when you are playing, make them look way more realistic. The physic engine is also a little bit better. You can still find all the different play modes you like in the previous version ! Really great game !

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Compared to the PS3 Version
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Compared to the PS3 Version, I played for around 3 months the PS3 version of this game and it was good, however the PS4 version is a lot better. I'm not only talking about graphics which indeed are better, but also in the gameplay, which is like watch a real game on HD. The game menus moves really quick, no performance issues, gameplay is awesome, graphics are amazing and the sound is incredible.

customer_reviews.title: but I still think it's the best soccer game on the market
customer_reviews.text: In terms of features, there's not many additional compared to last year's edition, but I still think it's the best soccer game on the market. The licensing of clubs, leagues, and players can't be touched by PES, though I could go for some graphical updates to some of the models, textures, and animations. The updated stadium and crowd presentation is fantastic. As far as the gameplay mechanics, it's a personal preference, but I still enjoy FIFA over PES.

product_meta.title: FIFA 15 - PlayStation 4
product_meta.description:
Platform:PlayStation 4| Edition:Standard• FIFA 15 brings soccer to life in stunning detail so fans can experience the emotion of the sport like never before. 
• Witness the intensity of crowds and listen to commentators guide fans through the story of the game with Dynamic Match Presentation. New Emotional Intelligence allows players to react to opponents and teammates within context, and relative to the narrative of the match. 
• Next Generation Visuals put fans on Living Pitches with grass that wears as the match progresses. Authentic Player Visuals give players true to life appearance. Player Control heightens the responsiveness of player movement and makes Man-to-Man Battles more rewarding than ever before.
• Pre-order FIFA 15 and receive up to 15 gold packs over 15 weeks to build your dream club in FIFA 15 Ultimate Team.

KEY FEATURES
• Emotional Intelligence - For the first time ever, FIFA 15 models the emotions of all 22 players on the pitch, giving fans a chance to experience first-hand the attitudes and personalities of the world’s best soccer players during a match.
• Dynamic Match Presentation - Match Day will feel more dynamic and alive than ever before – immersing you in the match action and never taking you out of the moment. With region specific behaviors, crowds will now be distinguished by cheers and chants designated to their club, league, country, or continent.
• Correct Contacts - Physically Correct Contacts revolutionizes the way the soccer interacts with the players and their environment. Every dribble, touch, pass, shot, and deflection moves corresponding to the spin of the ball in relation to the position of the body part or object that it connects with – this gives the soccer accurate spin, curl, and movement, as well as varied trajectories.
• Man-to-Man Battles - Dispossessing your opponent in FIFA 15 is more rewarding and physical than ever before. Players use Full-Body Defending to win possession and keep it.
feature_bullets: FIFA 15 brings soccer to life in stunning detail so fans can experience the emotion of the sport like never before.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars907 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
